title: Honor Level
body:
So the honor level rework has come out and I have looked at mine and seen that it is at checkpoint 0, level 0. Does that mean it has been reset back down from what I was at during pre-season? (e.g. lets say i was 50% of the way to level 1, did it get reset to 0% after the update?)

Just curious on this with the new update coming out.

replies.body:
I'm honour 2, checkpoint 3, so I should be reaching honour 3 soon.
Just thought I'd rub some salt in the wound. xD
